ancient.name: Ancient
ancient.description: Rusted. Covered in dust and cobwebs.

neglected.name: Neglected
neglected.description: Rust spots. Needs to be sharpened.

maintained.name: Used
maintained.description: Well used, but taken care of.

iron.name: Iron
iron.description: Dark gray or black. Rusts easily.

laminated iron.name: Laminated Iron
laminated iron.description: Wavy lines of dark and light gray.

exotic metal.name: Exotic Metal
exotic metal.description: Setting-based. Mithril, adamantine, or other unnatural metal.

toothed.name: Toothed
toothed.description: Single edged, like a rough saw.

thin.name: Thin
thin.description: Unusually thin blade, similar to an estoc.

reinforced.name: Reinforced
reinforced.description: Additional metal at the point. Specialized for thrusting.

spiked.name: Spiked
spiked.description: Multiple, perpendicular spikes along the point. Menacing.

rises.name: Rises
rises.description: Several ring-like bumps along the handle.

formed.name: Formed
formed.description: Shaped to fit a specific person's fingers.

disc.name: Disc
disc.description: Disc-shaped guard. Typical of japanese swords.

curvedCross.name: Curved Cross
curvedCross.description: T-shaped cross guard curved up towards the blade.

wide.name: Wide
wide.description: Wide cross-guard. Typical of viking swords.

uGuard.name: U-Guard
uGuard.description: U-shaped cross guard. Guard ends are parallel to the blade.

exotic.name: Exotic
exotic.description: Unique cross guard design. Wings, beast-heads, etc.

disc.name: Disc
disc.description: Disc or coin-shaped pommel attached at the disc's edge.

flatDisc.name: Flat Disc
flatDisc.description: Disc-shaped pommel attached at the flat center of the disc.

lobed.name: Lobed
lobed.description: Half-sphere pommel with multiple ridges. Attached to the grip on the flat side.

scentStopper.name: Scent Stopper
scentStopper.description: Cylindrical pommel which flares out from the grip. Similar to a decanter stopper.

fishTail.name: Fish Tail
fishTail.description: Flat, flared pommel with an intricate design.

curved.name: Curved
curved.description: Crescent or hook pointed away from the grip.

cap.name: Cap
cap.description: Half-sphere pommel, attached at the flat side.

twisted.name: Twisted
twisted.description: Pear-shaped pommel inlaid with metal grooves.

pear.name: Pear
pear.description: Pear-shaped pommel. Attached to grip on the sin side.

faceted.name: Faceted
faceted.description: Pear-shaped pommel with 8 flat edges around the length.

exotic.name: Exotic
exotic.description: Humanoid or beast head, claw, or other unique design.

straightTaper.name: Straight Taper
straightTaper.description: Straight edges which go from wide to thin.

curvedTaper.name: Curved Taper
curvedTaper.description: Straight edges with a gentle curve at the end.

leaf.name: Leaf
leaf.description: Edge tapers from wide to thin to wide again.

gentleCurve.name: Gentle Curve
gentleCurve.description: Edge bends slightly back. ie. katana.

heavyCurve.name: Heavy Curve
heavyCurve.description: Edge has a hard bend back. ie. scimitar.

sCurve.name: S-Curve
sCurve.description: Blade bends forward, then back. ie. cavalry saber.
